doc: An external identifier for the subject to map the their data to an external database
name: identifier

fields.name: name
fields.doc: A unique name for the identifier

fields.name: subject
fields.doc: The subject identified by the identifier

fields.name: createdBy
fields.doc: The com.orcatech.user.id for the user who created the record

fields.name: updatedBy

fields.name: deletedBy
fields.doc: The com.orcatech.user.id for the user who deleted the record
